duties_responsibilities.duty: Process transactions within established guidelines and values
Utilize ERPs, Salesforce, Chatter, and other applications to research and respond to sales inquiries
Handle case assigning, creating leads, investigating issues, and handling sales-related inquiries for multiple specialty teams
Respond to sales inquiries and resolve issues quickly, competently, and professionally
Demonstrate the ability to learn and master different skill sets

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
